definition: to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen

sentences.english: Please fill the baggage declaration form.
sentences.chinese: 请填好行李这张行李申报单。

sentences.english: Can I fill in a new customs declaration form now?
sentences.chinese: 我可以现在重新填一份海关申报单吗？

sentences.english: OK. Have you filled in the Declaration Form?
sentences.chinese: 好的，您填过申报单了吗？

sentences.english: Please use capital letters to fill in the entry card and customs declaration form of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 请用英文大写字母填写美国入境卡和申报单。

sentences.english: The loss of the declaration or any alterations made on it may be considered breaking the regulations.
sentences.chinese: 凡遗失本单或申报单作涂改均被认作违法。

sentences.english: Please fill in the declaration form.
You should first show your Customs declaration to the officer.
sentences.chinese: 你可以给海关官员看一下你的关税申报单。

sentences.english: Then fill out this currency declaration form please.
sentences.chinese: 那么请填写这张货币申报单。

sentences.english: First, you should fill out the declaration form.
sentences.chinese: 你首先得填写出境旅客申报单。

sentences.english: Entry card and Custom declaration in Chinese, please.
sentences.chinese: 我要中文的入境卡和海关申报单。

sentences.english: May I have some entry cards and customs declarations?
sentences.chinese: 我可以要一些入境卡和海关申报单吗？

sentences.english: Give your declaration form to the attendant at the exit.
sentences.chinese: 请将您的申报单交给出口的服务人员。

sentences.english: Do you have the Immigration Card and the Customs Declaration Form?
sentences.chinese: 你有入境卡和海关申报单吗？

sentences.english: Fill in this Baggage Declaration Form, please.
sentences.chinese: 请填一下这张行李申报单。

definition: to declare to customs or to the taxman
to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
